article: the u.n. security council responded to a request from iran on thursday and condemned the deadliest terrorist attack in the country in years , extending `` sincere condolences '' to the iranian people -- but not to the government , at u.s. insistence .
abstract: security council extends condolences to iranian people over bombing but not government
